overview: Stone is buying cattle cheap in Mexico, bringing them across the border without paying duty, changing the brands, and then selling them at a big profit. When Jack Rowan arrives and buys the vacant ranch used by Stone to sneak his cattle across the border, Stone sends out his henchmen to finish Jack off.
tagline: MY TRIGGER FINGER IS NERVOUS, HOMBRE...SO GET OUT OF TOWN BEFORE I BLOW YOUR HEAD OFF!
title: Land of the Six Guns
